pages.title: Manaweave
pages.text: Obtained by fusing Mana Gems with wool.$(br)Armor can be made of this material, as durable as Diamond, but stronger and more enchantable.$(br2)DURABILITY: $(l)HIGH$()$(br)PROTECTION: $(l)HIGH$()$(br)ENCHANTABILITY: $(l)PERFECT$()$(br)PROTECTION: $(l)HIGH$()$(br)EFFECT: $(l)REGENERATION
Mage's Robes can be crafted using individual strings of manaweave.
